Content.Data:
=3.5.1 RELEASE This is a hotfix addressing issue 877 GuidanceItemViewer and GuidanceItemEditor customizations are not picked up.
= 3.5 RELEASE APPLICATION CHANGES: The following application changes are included in 3.5 release
MAJOR IMPROVEMENTS
- Markdown support\\ - Site Data, which is client customization, and User Data, which is config and Users information, are now separated\\ - Virtual Articles is now supported for redirecting to another TM instance.\\ - Checkmarx native integration for Checkmarx GUI\\ - Direct Link article support, allows /a/<any text> to be directly mapped to an article\\
